item.description: #include <iostream> using namespace std; int q[100001]; int quick_sort(int l, int r, int k) { if (l == r) { return q[l]; } int x = q[l], i = l - 1, j = r + 1; while (i < j) { while (q[++i] < x); while (q[--j] > x); if (i < j) { swap(q[i], q[j]); } } int sl = j - l + 1; if (k <= sl) return quick_sort(l, j, k); return quick_sort(j + 1, r, k - sl); } int main() { int n, k; cin >> n >> k; for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) { cin >> q[i]; } cout << quick_sort(0, n - 1, k); return 0; }
